ygData.subject: Re: Tusk quest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yesterday I turned in a Mammoth Tusk from Everfrost, and it completed the quest.  I turned in the one tusk and the combined beetle eye at the same time.
ygData.messageBody:
Tom wrote:
>
> From: Tom <bearsfootball@...>
>
> guys i know how to complete this quest. Cracktusk or
> whatever his name is in south karana is a rare spawn
> elephant who sometimes drops bull elephant tusk. i
> killed him yesterday and he dropped a gigatic chipped
> tusk or something. me and my necro friend were very
> happy cause we thought it would work for the quest so
> she got some beetle eyes from kerra isle and went back
> to neriak and it didn't work :( after a little while
> of myself yelling at a gm, the gm told me that
> cracktusk drops the bull elephant tusks but it is
> rare...cracktusk is rare enough so good luck.
>

Yesterday I turned in a Mammoth Tusk from Everfrost,
and it completed the quest. I turned in the one tusk
and the combined beetle eye at the same time. He did
say "I was expecting mammoth tusks" before telling me
I was a good sk, which I thought was odd. My reward
was the 22nd SK spell Convoke Shadow (pet). After
doing this, he said another paragraph with a phrase
[in brackets] but he wouldn't respond to it. All I want
is a ring of the dead, that isn't asking too much, is
it? ;)

Xilith T'Vyn
Tunare
